CustomField.formula: CASE(VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate),12,2)), 23,"4:00 PM PT", 0,"5:00 PM PT", 1,"6:00 PM PT", 2,"7:00 PM PT", 3,"8:00 PM PT", 4,"9:00 PM PT", 5,"10:00 PM PT", 6,"11:00 PM PT", 7,"12:00 AM PT", 8,"1:00 AM PT", 9,"2:00 AM PT", 10,"3:00 AM PT", 11,"4:00 AM PT", 12,"5:00 AM PT", 13,"6:00 AM PT", 14,"7:00 AM PT", 15,"8:00 AM PT", 16,"9:00 AM PT", 17,"10:00 AM PT", 18,"11:00 AM PT", 19,"12:00 PM PT", 20,"1:00 PM PT", 21,"2:00 PM PT", 22,"3:00 PM PT", "The formula did not calculate correctly. Contact salesforce@appfolio.com")
CustomField.label: Case Hour Opened
